ch.ethz.inf.asl13.user40

Interface MessagingService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DatabaseServicePreparedStatement, MemoryMessagingService, MessagingServiceImpl, RequestTracer

    public interface MessagingService
    Defines the messaging service.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String NAMESPACE
      The port and service namespace.
      static String PORT_NAME
      Identifies the port.
      static String SERVICE_NAME
      Identifies the service.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void createClient(Client client) 
      void createQueue(int queueId)
      Creates a new queue in the system.
      void deleteQueue(int queue)
      Deletes the specified queue from the system.
      Message getFirstMessage(int queue, Client sender, boolean remove)
      Gets the oldest message waiting in the queue regardless of its priority.

      Lists all queues in the system.

    • Method Detail

      • insertMessage

        void insertMessage(Message message)
        Sends a message to the messaging system.
        Parameters:
        message - the message to be written to the queue.

      • getFirstMessage

        Message getFirstMessage(int queue,
                      Client sender,
                      boolean remove)
        Gets the oldest message waiting in the queue regardless of its priority.
        Parameters:
        queue - the queue to look at.
        sender - the client to fetch messages for.
        remove - if true, the message will be removed after being read; it will be left on the queue otherwise.
        Returns:
        The message; or null if there are no messages waiting for this client.

      • getMessageOfHighestPriority

        Message getMessageOfHighestPriority(int queue,
                                  Client sender,
                                  boolean remove)
        Gets the message of highest priority in the queue. If there are multiple messages of highest priority waiting, the oldest such message is returned.
        Parameters:
        queue - the queue to look at.
        sender - the client to fetch messages for.
        remove - if true, the message will be removed after being read; it will be left on the queue otherwise.
        Returns:
        The message; or null if there are no messages waiting for this client.

      • listQueues

        int[] listQueues()
        Lists all queues in the system.
        Returns:
        a list of all queues (in no particular order).

      • listQueuesWithWaitingMessages

        int[] listQueuesWithWaitingMessages(Client client)
        Lists all queues with waiting messages for the specified client.
        Returns:
        a list of all queues that have one or more messages waiting for this client.

      • createQueue

        void createQueue(int queueId)
        Creates a new queue in the system.
        Parameters:
        queueId - Identifies the queue.

      • deleteQueue

        void deleteQueue(int queue)
        Deletes the specified queue from the system.
        Parameters:
        queue - the queue to delete.

      • createClient

        void createClient(Client client)
